name: Cologne (itch)
description:
Cologne is an odlschool inspired pipe racing game. You have to win races to unlock new parts and skins for your vehicle. Each part has an impact on vehicle's performance.

There are three game modes:

- Race

Where you compete with three AI racers.

- Time trial

In which you have to beat the time and opponents don't matter, but they are racing as well.

- Arena

This is kind of a deathmatch on secial maps. You must destroy the bots and keep collecting power-ups such as: Ammo, Health, Shield and Boost.
